Text: updated Long DescriptionsIve made a few adjustments from the previous spreadsheet the US Gas spread products have been pulledthey no longer want to offer these that problem is solved fairly easily eh all the weather fallbacks have been entered the strike prices for HDDs and CDDs are the BidOffer amounts the indices should be denoted P or F for physical and financial products Still unresolved A Strike Price fieldnot sure where we are on this but I should have an update for the beginning of the next week all of the daily settlement fo the arithmetic average questions have not been resolvedthe confirm group is handling this as we email so once I receive an update from them I will forward it to you Regards Andy
